title: Video game NPCs are more conversative than Swiggy chat bot
selftext: Ordered by 8:30 pm and food was finally delivered by 11 pm. No option for cancellation and refund either. Excellent customer service üëç
comments:
I calculated the difference in amount between we personally going to buy take away compared to Zomato other day within 2 km radius

It was a difference of 175 rupees. That's less then hiring a auto to/from to restuarant.
